Description: Head-rest made from pieces of wood joined together.
Curator's comments: From register: "Ancient Egypt, XIX dynasty". This was acquired to show the similarity of modern Somali head-rests (as seen in Af1949,46.688) to those found in ancient Egypt.
Funder name: With contribution from: Art Fund (as NACF)
Acquisition notes: The series Af1949,46.1 to 845 is the African part of the collection formed by the London dealer William Ockelford Oldman in the years ca.1894-1926, purchased from his widow in 1949. See his biography.
